topics.title: Bank did not show up
topics.message: Thank you, we will get in touch with the Bank to check this case.

topics.title: I clicked by mistake on a NOW deal and got matched
topics.message: Thank you, we will check this case and come back to you.

topics.title: My fees got charged twice or more
topics.message: Thank you, we will check this case and come back to you.

topics.title: Exchanged amount was less than agreed in App
topics.message: As per our terms and conditions, applicable fees are always based on the amount agreed in the request. Please refer to our terms & conditions for further questions. Happy to have you with us.

topics.title: I have cancelled the deal
topics.message: As per our terms and conditions, cancellations need to happen in the app before the deal time. Please refer to our terms & conditions for further questions. Happy to have you with us.

topics.title: Why did I pay that amount of fees?
topics.message: User gets explanation of his fee calculation

topics.title: I want to report this user

topics.title: I realized when doing the deal

topics.message: Thank you for letting us know and supporting the Bebanx family.

topics.title: Bank/Getter wanted to do offline deal

topics.title: I agreed
topics.message: Thank you for reporting this. Please note that this is not in line with our terms & conditions. In order to provide our service to you, please do not accept such deals in future anymore.

topics.message: Thank you for reporting this. As a general note: you can only text with other users until the deal was closed.

I changed my mind
topics.message: If there was a problem with the Bank/Getter, please go to Problem with Bank/Getter section.

topics.title: I need a receipt for this trip
topics.message: Please let us know an E-Mail address where we can send the receipt to.
